text: Erik Weiner (born June 7, 1977) is an American actor, writer, comedian and producer. He is best known for co-creating the play The Bomb-itty of Errors with Jordan Allen-Dutton, and his role as Agent Sesbo on HBO's Boardwalk Empire. ==Other websites== * * Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Comedians from Los Angeles Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:1977 births Category:Writers from Los Angeles
title: Erik Weiner
